description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.tniq6wm0fQSzLbB0]{Shock and Awe}

You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against effects that would blind or deafen you. Any weapon you wield that has the powered weapon special property or that uses ammunition gains the bright weapon special property; you can activate or deactivate this ability as a swift or move action. Bright weapons you wield gain the blind critical hit effect or the deafen critical hit effect. If your bright weapon already has a critical hit effect, when you score a critical hit, you apply either the weaponâ€™s normal critical hit effect, the blind critical hit effect, or the deafen critical hit effect.

modifiers.name: Blinding and Deafening effects
modifiers.notes: You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against effects that would blind or deafen you.
